text: Krazy Kim Kardashian is ripping into “ absent dad ” Kanye West, accusing him of not doing nearly enough parentally, a source reveals to RadarOnline. com exclusively! “ Since Chicago came into their lives he ’ s barely changed a diaper, and it ’ s Kim who ’ s up half the night rocking her back to sleep, ” snitches a pal.
